name: Body Builder (Racso3, Ynot13)
description:
Controls:
  • W - Jump
  • A D - Walk
  • Press Die to die
  • Press Restart to restart
  • Press Main Menu to go to main menu
  • Press Credit to read credit
What to play: 

Tons of dead bodies, terrible punchlines, cool maze with 5 completely different levels.

Like once a wise blind old man said, "This game has good graphics."

Most graphics are drawn, except for the environment and the background (most of them). Music is created by Racso. Sound effects are generated using sfxr.
